name: Mortal Kombat II Special
summary:
Mortal Kombat II Special is a pirated fighting game developed by Hummer Team and published by J.Y. Company. It is based on Mortal Kombat II.

The fighting engine is modified from Mortal Kombat II, altering the special moves to make them function like they're supposed to and adding blood. The fatalities, however, are still missing from this game, with the fight simply ending when you win.
